effect.short: Raises the user's Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s
fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
